content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the applicant was awarded an apartment as personal property while the defendant received land plots and buildings the court also ordered the defendant to pay the applicant compensation for their larger share of the property the court considered various articles related to matrimonial property in the civil code the applicant brought a legal action to dissolve the marriage and requested the division of property and financial compensation the court rejected some claims but upheld others including the division of an apartment and garden plots the court also considered evidence regarding the purchase of a vehicle and rejected the defendants claim for compensation the court ordered both parties to pay costs and stamp duties associated with the proceedings

metadata.cost: 3'120 EUR (legal fees) + 884.19 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the defendant + 405.80 EUR (legal fees) + 1'413.80 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the applicant
